mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_NO) AS CNT FROM TBL_PRODUCT

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, CATEGORY_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_REG_DATE, PRODUCT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, PRODUCT_NO, CATEGORY_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_REG_DATE, PRODUCT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_NO, NVL(CATEGORY_CODE, '') AS CATEGORY_CODE, NVL(PRODUCT_NAME, '') AS PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(PRODUCT_PRICE, 0) AS PRODUCT_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(PRODUCT_REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS PRODUCT_REG_DATE, NVL(PRODUCT_CONTENT, '') AS PRODUCT_CONTENT FROM TBL_PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, NVL(FILE_NAME, '') AS FILE_NAME FROM TBL_PRODUCT_FILE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{value}
